                                            java.lang.String format)
        Formats the given date object to a string representation using the specified date format.
        Parameters:

        format - The format string representing the desired date format.
        Returns:
        The formatted date string.

      • toDate

        public static java.util.Date toDate(java.lang.String date,
                                    java.lang.String format)
        Parses the given date string according to the specified date format and returns a Date object.
        Parameters:
        date - The date string to be parsed.
        format - The format string representing the expected date format.
        Returns:
        The parsed Date object, or the current date if parsing fails.

      • isValidDateFormat

        public static boolean isValidDateFormat(java.lang.String date,
                                        java.lang.String format)
        Checks if the given date string is valid according to the specified date format.
        Parameters:
        date - The date string to be validated.
        format - The format string representing the expected date format.
        Returns:
        true if the date string is valid, false otherwise.

      • toInfoLine

        public static java.lang.String toInfoLine(int arg1,
                                          java.lang.String arg2,
                                          java.lang.String arg3,
                                          java.lang.String arg4,
                                          int arg5,
                                          java.lang.Double arg6)
        Formats the provided arguments into a formatted information line string.
        Parameters:
        arg1 - The first argument as an integer.
        arg2 - The second argument as a string.
        arg3 - The third argument as a string.
        arg4 - The fourth argument as a string.
        arg5 - The fifth argument as an integer.
        arg6 - The sixth argument as a double.
        Returns:
        The formatted information line string.

      • toTotalLine

        public static java.lang.String toTotalLine(int count,
                                           double total)
        Formats the provided count and total amount into a formatted total line string.
        Parameters:
        count - The count as an integer.
        total - The total amount as a double.
        Returns:
        The formatted total line string.
